extensionDescription.message: Choose where tabs appear, and what happens when they disappear.

status_settings_saved.description: Status message shown when settings are saved.

status_input_invalid.description: Status message shown when a setting input is invalid.

botton_reset_setting.description: Tooltip for the reset button beside each setting.

botton_reset_all.description: Button label to reset all settings to their default values.

summary_advanced_settings.description: Label for the advanced settings section.

label_new_tab_position.message: When opening the New Tab page:
label_new_tab_position.description: Label for the new chrome://newtab position setting.

label_foreground_link_position.message: When opening a link in the foreground:
label_foreground_link_position.description: Label for the foreground link position setting.

label_background_link_position.description: Label for the background link position setting.

label_after_close_activation.message: After closing a tab, switch to:
label_after_close_activation.description: Label for the post-close tab activation behavior.

label__tab_batch_creation_threshold_ms.description: Input prompt for the time interval threshold for batch opening tabs. Used to preserve tab order and grouping when restoring tabs.

label__tab_batch_activation_threshold_ms.description: Input prompt for the time interval threshold for batch activating tabs. Used to accelerate tab closing and switching behavior.

label__persistent_background.description: Checkbox span (label) for the persistent background setting.

label__debug_mode.description: Checkbox span (label) for the debug mode setting, which enables debug output in the extension console.

option_default.description: Default option for tab creation position.

option_before_active_creation.description: Option to open the tab before the currently active tab.

option_after_active_creation.description: Option to open the tab after the currently active tab.

option_window_first_creation.description: Option to open the tab as the first in the window.

option_window_last_creation.description: Option to open the tab as the last in the window.

option_before_removed_activation.description: Option to activate the tab to the left of the closed tab.

option_after_removed_activation.description: Option to activate the tab to the right of the closed tab.

option_window_first_activation.description: Option to open the first tab after closing a tab.

option_window_last_activation.description: Option to open the last tab after closing a tab.

option_activation_history_activation.description: Option to activate the previously activated tab after closing a tab.
